headline.main: The Undying" Spirit of France; It has survived other and worse defeats, says Maurois, and will again turn the conqueror out The Spirit of France

lead_paragraph: IT Often happens that one or the other of my American friends asks me: "Has the spirit of France changed? Are Frenchmen ready to accept a foreign domination in their country? Do they give up all hope of liberation?"
abstract: A Maurois on undying spirit of country; illus
snippet: IT Often happens that one or the other of my American friends asks me: "Has the spirit of France changed? Are Frenchmen ready to accept a foreign domination in their country? Do they give up all hope of liberation?"...
